title: Was Moe Too Honest With His Friend About This?
description:
Bert always says 100% honesty in ANY relationship is too much. And Moe is starting to realize it's true. A woman friend of his is excited about her new relationship, but her boyfriend has a problem with another male friend of hers. But is his reasoning for being upset valid? We discuss.
